      • init

        public static void init(android.content.Context context)
        Initialization UserKit instance, your api token must be placed in AndroidManifest.xml inside application tag. 
         
 <meta-data android:name="USER_KIT_API_TOKEN" android:value="your_api_token_here" />
        Parameters:
        context - application context.
        See Also:
        init(Context, String)

      • init

                        java.lang.String apiToken)
        Initialization UserKit instance with an api token.
        Parameters:
        context - application context
        apiToken - userkit api token

      • identify

        public void identify(java.lang.String profileId)
        Replace current profile ID with new one (in local), all analytic events and profile updating will use this identified ID.
        Parameters:
        profileId - new profile ID.
        See Also:
        getProfileId(), ProfileManager.getProfileId()

        public boolean hasProfile()
        Check if current profile ID is null or not.
        Returns:

      • postGcmToken

        @WorkerThread
public boolean postGcmToken(java.lang.String deviceToken)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Register GCM (device) token to CMS synchronously, don't run this method in main thread.
        Normally, SDK will handle this stuff, developer needn't care about this. Whenever GCM token was refreshed or profile ID was updated, an OneoffTask will be scheduled to update token in CMS.
        Parameters:
        deviceToken - GCM token of current device.
        Returns:
        true if process was success, otherwise return false.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • alias

        public void alias(java.lang.String aliasProfileID,

        Alias profile ID.
        Parameters:

        defaultCallback - OnProfileEditCallback

      • timeEvent

        public void timeEvent(java.lang.String eventName)
        Start tracking duration of a timing event.
        Parameters:
        eventName - The event name, must be consistent with argument `eventName` on track(String, JSONObject)
